basics.name: Alexander Rios
basics.label: Backend Developer specialized in Golang and Java (Spring Boot)
basics.summary: Backend Developer specialized in Golang and Java. I have built everything from a password manager to cybersecurity tools and APIs, using technologies like Spring Boot, Fiber, and Gin. My expertise also extends to AWS and containerization with Docker, which enhance the development projects and operational efficiency. Passionate about cybersecurity and proficient in Bash/Shell scripting, I skillfully manage various Linux distributions. My commitment to continuous learning drives my professional growthin the dynamic tech landscape.

work.summary: Currently working as a CnC machine operator, I have learned together with the company and have learned various areas such as team work, working on good ideas to achieve quick solutions and continuous learning efficiency.

courses: Platzi - Golang from Basic to Expert
Platzi - Java Spring Boot, Security and deployments

projects.name: Dialosoft Forum
projects.description: Dialosoft is a comprehensive forum solution, comparable to platforms like SMF and phpBB, but built with modern technologies to offer superior performance and ease of use

projects.name: GoPass
projects.description: A sophisticated password management desktop application, developed in Golang for secure and efficient handling of your credentials

projects.name: VaultShield
projects.description: VaultShield a solution for secure credential management. Designed with passion during our devathon event, this platform aims to revolutionize the way teams manage their sensitive data.

projects.name: Styerr Network
projects.description: An infrastructure that offers a software-as-a-service for people who want to play real-life simulations of the GTA 5 video game with friends.
